headline: Ask HN: Dae use google.com/ig from –(2006-2010), kinda like desktop widgets
description:
Can't find screencaps or hints of it ever existing... made me sorta sad and lonely there's no museum, archive, or go to blogger that'd spring up in my search results... Was the best I got without an exhaustive search > 5m

https://uxdesign.cc/google-how-the-biggest-search-engines-homepage-has-changed-over-the-last-20-years-3b59db931a0d
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: Dae使用google.com/ig从-（2006-2010），有点像桌面小工具
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: Dae使用google.com/ig從-（2006-2010），有點像桌面小工具
description_zh-Hans:
找不到它曾经存在的截图或提示......让我有点伤心和孤独，没有博物馆、档案馆或去博主会在我的搜索结果中出现...... 这是我在没有进行详尽搜索的情况下得到的最好结果 > 5m

https://uxdesign.cc/google-how-the-biggest-search-engines-homepage-has-changed-over-the-last-20-years-3b59db931a0d
description_zh-Hant:
找不到它曾經存在的截圖或提示......讓我有點傷心和孤獨，沒有博物館、檔案館或去博主會在我的搜索結果中出現...... 這是我在沒有進行詳盡搜索的情況下得到的最好結果 > 5m

https://uxdesign.cc/google-how-the-biggest-search-engines-homepage-has-changed-over-the-last-20-years-3b59db931a0d
